mapper.insert: INSERT INTO return_supplier_order_pro( return_supplier_order_info_id, product_name, product_price, num, total, orde_by, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id )VALUES ( #{return_supplier_order_info_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{num}, #{total}, #{orde_by}, #{norms1}, #{norms2}, #{norms3}, #{product_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT return_supplier_order_pro_id, return_supplier_order_info_id, replace(product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, product_price, num, total, orde_by, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id FROM return_supplier_order_pro WHERE return_supplier_order_info_id=#{return_supplier_order_info_id} ORDER BY return_supplier_order_pro_id
